text: Biserka Cvejić (; November 5, 1923 – January 7, 2021) was a Serbian operatic mezzo-soprano and contralto. She was a university professor. Her career began at the Belgrade Opera in 1954. She was a member of the Vienna State Opera from 1959 to 1979. She first appeared at the Metropolitan Opera in 1961 as Amneris in Verdi's Aida. Cvejić died at the age of 97 in Belgrade on January 7, 2021. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Serbian singers Category:Serbian actors Category:European opera singers
title: Biserka Cvejić
